Class BugReportController

 @RestController(value="bugReportController")
 @RequestMapping(path="/bugreport")
public class BugReportController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getAllPendingBugReports

        @GetMapping(path="/pending",
            produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<BugReport> getAllPendingBugReports()
        Returns an ArrayList of all BugReports on the database that have a pending status.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of BugReports with Pending Status

      • saveUser

        @PostMapping(path="/approvedeny",
             consumes="application/json")
public void saveUser(@RequestBody
                                                                                                   BugReport bugReport)
        Returns a Json object that approves or denies BugReports on the databse.

        This method is the end point for approving or denying Bugreports for people to resolve. Approving the Bugreport will update the report with an open status, allowing other users to examine it while denying the BugReport will delete it completely from the database.

        Parameters:
        bugReport - BugReport to be approved or Denied

      • saveBugReport

        @PostMapping(path="/save",
             consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BugReport> saveBugReport(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                               BugReport bugReport)
        Returns a Json object that contains the BugReport to be saved onto database.

        This method is the end point for saving Bug Reports to the Database

        Parameters:
        bugReport - BugReport to be saved onto database
        Returns:
        a Response Entity with a json body that contains a BugReports and an approved HttpStatus

      • resolution

        @PostMapping(path="/resolve",
             consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> resolution(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Object obj)
        Returns a Json object that contains the BugReports Status open.

        This method is the end point for resolving bugs and ensuring that the creator and resolver of a bug report are different users.

        Parameters:
        obj - generic object to hold json
        Returns:
        a Response Entity with a json body that contains a BugReports with the status of open .

      • getBugReportByStatus

        @GetMapping(path="/open",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getBugReportByStatus()
        Returns a Json object that contains the BugReports Status open.

        This method is the end point for getting a Bug Reports's with the Status open.

        Returns:
        a Response Entity with a json body that contains a BugReports with the status value open .
